channel.title: Sundry on Data Science in Education
channel.description: Recent content in Sundry on Data Science in Education

item.title: Sharing some functions from my personal R package
item.description: In this post I basically just wanted to share some recent developments that I’ve made to my personal R package {sundry}. All of the recent advancements have been made to work with the tidyverse, so things like group_by should work seamlessly. If you feel like giving the package a whirl, I’d love any feedback you have or bugs you may find. At this point the package is only on github.
